attributes.additional_details:
The queen can currently dissolve uk parliment and take back power until a new parliment is formed. 

The british people call up on the parliment of the united kindom to be dissolved and the wishes of the british person listend to.
attributes.background: The uk parliment has proved that they have lost the trust of the uk people. They have failed to uphold what the people of this country want.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235547
